item.title: Game Fairy Mystery Pirate Island
item.description: During the game Pirate Island Mystery Fairies you have to collect puzzle pictures with images of scenes from the famous cartoon. Choose one of the pictures and the number of pieces into which it will be divided. Put the puzzles in their places and collect the image you like. This game will keep you near the computer for a long time and will allow you to spend time in the company of funny characters from a fairy tale story.
